scripts.to-pdf: pandoc -V mainfont=urwa030 -V fontsize=12pt -V geometry:top=0.8in -V geometry:right=0.8in -V geometry:bottom=0.8in -V geometry:left=0.8in README.MD -o tfc-sindrome-metabolico.pdf
scripts.publish: npm run build && npm run to-pdf && npm run to-docx && git add . && git commit -m $(date "+%Y-%m-%d@%H:%M") && git pull && git push
